TopicTitle: The Name Change Thread (WARNING! ONE TIME ONLY!)

Articles.Content: You can't request that *other people* change their names, hieywiey. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

> 
> You can't request that *other people* change their names, hieywiey. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Awwwwwwww... ![;.;](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cry.gif)

> 
> And here I thought you would have just wanted to correct the misspelling of "waffle".

It's an old username i have, purposely spelled Wafle, pronounced Way-fle, not sure why i thought it up, it was several years ago, but i like Kozak better ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

EDIT:

Your sig... my reaction: "Whaaaaaat????"
Alright. Three weeks or so later I found out my problem with this account. It's a different name than my Youtube account! May I request to change it to "Canberra Gaming"?
Done, also sent an account reminder in case you forget to login with the new name ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> Done, also sent an account reminder in case you forget to login with the new name ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

I read that in a split second as: "Done, also sent an account reminder......"

and I thought you had billed him for the service.... ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) Pay up, Pay NOW! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
Could I get my name changed to Panzerbeard, please? Always bothered me that I didn't use my regular screenname on here..

> 
> Could I get my name changed to Panzerbeard, please? Always bothered me that I didn't use my regular screenname on here..

Done.

Back in my day we had to live with username choice regret.
Can you change my name to just Laythe? (Without the "?") ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
I was going to request my name be changed to my all round IGN, but than I read that I can't have Kerman in my name... ;( R.I.P IGN

> 
> Done.
> Back in my day we had to live with username choice regret.

Thankya kindly.

Back in my day we didn't have usernames, an we had to walk 20 miles to the post office, uphill both ways. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

> 
> Can you change my name to just Laythe? (Without the "?") ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Unfortunately, no. That name is taken.
Is that user still active?

> 
> Is that user still active?

I don't think they can kick a user for inactivity so you can take his username. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)
I just checked and his last activity was in 2013 and he has 0 posts. I think he just decided to make an account and never used it.
Well, we're still not going to kick him/her out. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
Maybe you could have your name changed to "Laythe." Or "Laythe!"

> 
> Maybe you could have your name changed to "Laythe." Or "Laythe!"

Are special characters allowed? Didn't think they were...

- - - Updated - - -

How about "Laythe\_" ?

Since the other user isn't active, maybe you could change his name to Laythe, but with a space at the end. Or any of the other suggestions. I think that there's a lot of old accounts that were never used.

- - - Updated - - -

EDIT: What about "Laythe" in italics?

> 
> Since the other user isn't active, maybe you could change his name to Laythe, but with a space at the end. Or any of the other suggestions. I think that there's a lot of old accounts that were never used.
> - - - Updated - - -
> 
> EDIT: What about "Laythe" in italics?

I don't think that formatting matters. **Laythe**, *Laythe* or Laythe are still Laythe.

I suggest Laythe\_, or \_Laythe.

EDIT: Just had another idea, how about instead of changing his name, you change yours to "Laythe " with a space in the end?

> 
> I don't think that formatting matters. **Laythe**, *Laythe* or Laythe are still Laythe.
> I suggest Laythe\_, or \_Laythe.
> 
> EDIT: Just had another idea, how about instead of changing his name, you change yours to "Laythe " with a space in the end?

Yes! That would probably work.

Uh, what would work, "Laythe\_", "\_Laythe" or "Laythe "

(I presume that "Laythe " is the one that you preferred, but you can never be too sure)

To show the true and utter lonliness of the planet Dres, I would like to have my name changed to:

Dres

Yes, I have checked. Yes, it is not taken. WOOOOOO! And I'm totally serious. I like Dres, it's cool.

For anyone who is interested, so far I have found that Gilly and Tylo are also open. I wonder how long those are going to last now ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

(Unless there are somehow invisible shadow people named that, in which case I will be severely dissapointed and slightly alarmed.)

"Laythe Dweller" "The Laythe Initiative"

what is this

> 
> "Laythe Dweller" "The Laythe Initiative"
> what is this

Laytheception? \*X-files and Inception theme play at same time\*
